oai_dc:dc.dc:otherSubject: Agricultural products; Agriculture; al-Hayʼah al-ʻArabīyah al-ʻUlyā; Bribery; Dīwān; Education; Family structure; Farmers; Farming practices; Income; Intervillage relations; Kafr ʻAnān (Palestine); Land ownership; Land purchase; Military training; Neighboring villages; Respect; Social status; Socio-economic conditions; al-Aṣbaḥ, ‘Abdullāh, 1910-1938; Arabs; Bombings; Border crossing; Bribery; British officers; Circassians; Discrimination; Employment; Guards; Holidays; Income; Jerusalem (Palestine); Military training; Officers; Police; Prisoners; Smuggling; Social relations; Trans-Jordan Frontier Forces; Ṭūlkarm (Palestine); British police forces; British policy; Capital punishment; Courts; Disputes; Escape; Guards; Injuries; Military training; Nazareth (Palestine); Officers; Prison sentences; Prisoners; Prisoners' treatment; Professions; Punishment; Tulkarm (Prison: Palestine); Work; Akka (Prison: Palestine); al-Ṣubayḥ (Arab tribe); Imprisonment; Jewish holidays; Juvenile corrections; Leaders; Nazareth (Palestine); Police investigations; Political prisoners; Prisoners' treatment; Torture; al-Qāwūqjī, Fawzī, 1890-1977; Arab Salvation Army; Employment; Expulsion from Palestine; Love; Refugee experience; Routes; United Nations Relief and Works Agency for Palestine Refugees in the Near East

oai_dc:dc.dc:biography: The interview was recorded on December 5, 1998 with Jamīl Mūsá al-‘Alī, male, born in 1928 in Kafr ʻAnān, Palestine and resides in Nahr al-Bārid Palestinian Refugee Camp, Lebanon. He was a policeman in the British Police forces.
oai_dc:dc.dc:biographyAR: سجلت المقابلة مع جميل موسى العلي في 5 كانون الأول عام 1998، ذكر، ولد عام 1928 في كفر عنان، فلسطين ويقيم في مخيم نهر البارد للاجئين الفلسطينين، لبنان. كان شرطيًّا في قوات الشرطة البريطانية.
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Rural life and employment in British police forces. (@ 0:00)
oai_dc:dc.dc:tocAR: الحياة الريفية والتوظيف في قوات الشرطة البريطانية. (@ 0:00)

oai_dc:dc.dc:tocAR: معاملة المساجين والعمل في السجون البريطانية. (@ 80:38)
oai_dc:dc.dc:toc: Expulsion from Palestine and refugee experience. (@ 100:31)
